siteMetadata.name: Praphulla Bhawsar
siteMetadata.title: Praphulla Bhawsar
siteMetadata.description: AI Engineer | PhD Student | Geekus Maximus

projects.name: ImageBox3: Client-side Whole Slide Image Tiling with GeoTIFF.js
projects.description: Developed an in-browser tiling mechanism for Whole Slide Images using GeoTIFF.js, leveraging the similarity of WSI data formats and Cloud-Optimized GeoTIFFs.

projects.name: EpiPath: Digital Pathology in the Browser
projects.description: Currently developing a zero-cost web app for Annotation, AI Modeling and Active Learning on Digital Medical Images in Box directly from the browser.

projects.name: Galaxy Morphology Classification Via Transfer Learning
projects.description: Trained a VGG-19 CNN using Keras to classify galaxies by morphology from raw sky survey images, demonstrating the advantages of transfer learning on astronomical datasets.

experience.name: National Cancer Institute
experience.description:

publications.name: Genomic and evolutionary classification of lung cancer in never smokers
publications.authors: Zhang, T., Joubert, P., Ansari-Pour, N. et al., Nature Genetics 2021

publications.name: Mortality Tracker: the COVID-19 case for real time web APIs as epidemiology commons
publications.authors: Almeida, J. S., Shiels, M., Bhawsar, P. et al., Bioinformatics 2020

frontmatter.title: ImageBox3: The No-Server Whole Slide Image Tile Server
frontmatter.description: Viewing whole slide images directly in the browser on cloud-hosted data
